name: Elf-World (Three Kingdoms)
description:
Bring you a new taste of the new three kindoms! There would be a massive forty Generals in it.
Through capturing of city after the attack, and develop it, would obtain a clue to get new generals.
Collect special weapons from special events.
co-ordinate the different generals , to defeat the powerful four Therions
More exciting, until you find out!
